name: jobapp
description: CREATE TABLE students (     id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,     name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,     email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,     password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,     phone VARCHAR(15),     profile VARCHAR(255),  -- For storing the profile picture path or URL     bio TEXT,     resume VARCHAR(255),  -- For storing the resume file path or URL     created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );
